title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: A rediscovered item becomes even more precious the second time around. Sometimes, you dont know how precious something is until you lose it. The balancing Libra New Moon in your 8th House of Sharing and Renewal may trigger a replay of this lost-and-found dynamic. You might initially feel some trepidation about losing again what you lost before. But youre a stronger person now. So, regardless of whether youre recovering a wallet or a dear relationship, you possess the wisdom of experience to be a better steward. Philosopher Seneca wrote, Many things have fallen only to rise higher. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
